original_text: So Jesus put his hands on each of the children's heads and he prayed for them. After that, he went away from that place.

sentences.original_text: So Jesus put his hands on each of the children's heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님은 각 어린이의 머리에 손을 얹으시고

sentences.original_text: he went away from that place
